Text:
One of the best mix's that I have ever heard...Maybe not made to be 'mix perfect', but everything is in perspective... It definitely delivers... Great Tunes, Great Artist,  Amazing feel........ and, a must for all..

I'm from Hull, and Paul's appearance was amazing!

Love this!

Pete
14 years old but still an absolute classic, a fantastic mix!
Thank you. I was looking for this.
